title: Dawn of Christmas
description: After overcoming great odds as a new couple, Sammy and Sara finally have a chance to settle into their lives under one roof. With the holidays quickly approaching, Sammy wants everything to be perfect for their first true Christmas at home together, and the big surprise she has in store for Sara is sure to be life-changing. However, no holiday season would be complete without a few mishaps, and Sammy soon realizes that despite her best laid plans, fate has a way of bending the rules. Continue the journey in this short story of Stephanie Motes's best-selling novel, After the Dawn, with this amazing young couple and a new addition or two, and rediscover how the greatest gift of all is love.
author: Stephanie Motes
